extendedInfo.description: Christian Dating goes Mobile! Fellowship with other Christian Singles in your Mobile area! You can filter your search based on Faith and Values! Find your match made in Heaven right NOW!

reviews.title: this is crap.
reviews.comment: I downloaded the app.did ok.guess. what.its not possible. someone. has my screen. name. I put another. name. that\'s taken. I did. another. Screen name. No body. Knows..that\'s taken its not possible. for someone. to have your same. Screen. name. You pick. Out of your head.I tried every one.that no one have. Its been taken. that\'s. Crazy. Do anyone. Have the.same problem. I need to know.
reviews.author: Anthony Johnson
